body:
Don't see the tour package you were looking for? We are happy to put together a custom tour for groups of 4 or more. Choose a combination of any of our activities: Kayaking, Horseback Riding, Sailing, Wine Tasting, Beer Tasting & even Paragliding! Just give us a call or send an email to discuss the details.

You may also want to check out our [private chartered boats](/boat-charters) as well as our [group events](/group-events).
priceLong: starts as low as $50 per person
title: Custom Tour
